We provide loans, savings, and fixed deposit solutions to our customers. Our vision is to be the most convenient lending company, delivering outstanding service experiences.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position:&nbsp;SME Portfolio Manager

Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos

The position


	As an SME Portfolio Manager, you will be responsible for managing and growing a portfolio of SME clients.
	You will collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand portfolio performance, identify opportunities, mitigate risks, and deliver data-driven insights to support strategic decision-making.
	Your role will involve performance monitoring, relationship management, and executing initiatives that enhance the value of the SME portfolio.


Responsibilities&nbsp;


	Manage the performance and growth of a portfolio of SME clients, ensuring retention, satisfaction, and profitability.
	Analyze SME portfolio data to uncover trends, identify risks, and recommend actionable insights to drive business outcomes.
	Monitor key performance indicators (KPIs) for SME clients and proactively address issues affecting performance.
	Collaborate with Product, Risk, and Operations teams to align portfolio strategy with broader business goals.
	Build and maintain dashboards using tools like Power BI to provide visibility into portfolio metrics and performance.
	Support the development of credit strategies and lending solutions tailored to SME client needs.
	Lead or support projects aimed at improving portfolio health, client segmentation, and revenue optimization.


Requirements
Required:


	A Minimum of 5 years of experience in SME banking, portfolio management, credit analysis in a financial services context.
	Strong analytical skills with the ability to interpret data and translate it into business strategy


Preferred:


	Proficiency in Power BI, MySQL, or similar tools for data analysis and reporting.
	Experience working cross-functionally with sales, risk, product, and operations teams.
	Solid understanding of SME financing and risk management.


This job is perfect for you if you:


	Experienced in Analytics /Business Intelligence roles.
	Proficient in the use of Powerbi, SQL and Data Warehouse.
	You&rsquo;re collaborative, enthusiastic with the aptitude and desire to learn.
	Ability to translate ambiguous business requirements into analytical insights.


Benefits


	You&rsquo;ll receive competitive compensation and work with amazing people.
	You&rsquo;ll work in a beautiful environment with a flat structure and solve complex, real-world challenges.

SME Portfolio Manager Job at Renmoney




        
    

        
        Renmoney - We are a passionate team determined to challenge the status quo and make financial inclusion count for the millions of under-banked individuals and small business owners in Nigeria. We provide loans, savings, and fixed deposit solutions to our customers. Our vision is to be the most convenient lending company, delivering outstanding service experiences.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: SME Portfolio Manager

Job Location: Lagos

The position
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	As an SME Portfolio Manager, you will be responsible for managing and growing a portfolio of SME clients.
	You will collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand portfolio performance, identify opportunities, mitigate risks, and deliver data-driven insights to support strategic decision-making.
	Your role will involve performance monitoring, relationship management, and executing initiatives that enhance the value of the SME portfolio.


Responsibilities 


	Manage the performance and growth of a portfolio of SME clients, ensuring retention, satisfaction, and profitability.
	Analyze SME portfolio data to uncover trends, identify risks, and recommend actionable insights to drive business outcomes.
	Monitor key performance indicators (KPIs) for SME clients and proactively address issues affecting performance.
	Collaborate with Product, Risk, and Operations teams to align portfolio strategy with broader business goals.
	Build and maintain dashboards using tools like Power BI to provide visibility into portfolio metrics and performance.
	Support the development of credit strategies and lending solutions tailored to SME client needs.
	Lead or support projects aimed at improving portfolio health, client segmentation, and revenue optimization.


Requirements
Required:


	A Minimum of 5 years of experience in SME banking, portfolio management, credit analysis in a financial services context.
	Strong analytical skills with the ability to interpret data and translate it into business strategy


Preferred:


	Proficiency in Power BI, MySQL, or similar tools for data analysis and reporting.
	Experience working cross-functionally with sales, risk, product, and operations teams.
	Solid understanding of SME financing and risk management.


This job is perfect for you if you:


	Experienced in Analytics /Business Intelligence roles.
	Proficient in the use of Powerbi, SQL and Data Warehouse.
	You’re collaborative, enthusiastic with the aptitude and desire to learn.
	Ability to translate ambiguous business requirements into analytical insights.


Benefits


	You’ll receive competitive compensation and work with amazing people.
	You’ll work in a beautiful environment with a flat structure and solve complex, real-world challenges.

  "description": "CodeLabProjects Group(CLP) is an American conglomerate of companies, Located in the Maryland,U.S.A and currently expanding operations to Liberia, Nigeria, Ghana, Ethiopia,the Caribbean other part of Africa and Asia, currently headquartered in the U.S, As of 2018.

We go the extra mile by gaining deep understanding of our client&#39;s business environment,trends and applying most relevant solutions that would definitely ensure a return-on-investment.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

	Excellent organizational, analytical, and problem-solving skills.
	Strong attention to detail and ability to work independently.
	Good communication and leadership skills.
